item.description:
Movie Night: Escape Fire: The Fight To Rescue American Healthcare

A powerful and thought-provoking documentary that exposes the U.S. healthcare system as one designed to profit on disease rather than health. The film interweaves personal stories with the efforts of leaders battling to transform it.

Some of the folks in our community conversation at our last movie night shared a passion for sustainable healthcare. This movie is an opportunity to look at that and have a conversation about what health care might be in our community.

There will be a facilitated conversation after the film with an invitation to bring this into the unfolding Transition Portland initiative. Original Meetup: http://www.meetup.com/Transition-Towns-Start-ups-in-Portland/events/111707232/

 

Pot luck at 6:30pm

Screening at 7:00pm

Brief Dialogue at 8:45 pm

Clean up at 9:30

3$ Donation

Join us.

View Trailer

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: What Could Healthcare Be? Movie Night: Escape Fire
